explains: n. 裨益，优势，有用的东西
【名】 （Boon）（英）布恩，（瑞典、德）博恩，（泰）汶（人名）

sentences.en: Oft asked I for this boon.
At last, Hook had got the boon for which he craved.
sentences.cn: 最终，胡克得到了他所渴望的恩惠。

sentences.en: My wife Ilsabill Will have her own will, and hath sent me to beg a boon of thee!
sentences.cn: 我的妻子伊尔莎比尔维尔有她自己的意愿，她派我来祈求你的恩惠！
